ValidationRule.description: prevent manual update of stage once it has reached final except 'Archive'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator",AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Final"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Recall") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Final"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Submitted") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Final"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Approval In Progress") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Final"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Approved") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Final"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Rejected") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Final"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "In progress") ) || AND( ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(NDIAQuoteStage__c), "Final"), ISPICKVAL(NDIAQuoteStage__c, "Not yet commenced") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Stage cant be manually updated once it has reached final. Quote can only be 'Archived'
